pointsandrectangleslab

Class APRectangle

  • java.lang.Object
    • pointsandrectangleslab.APRectangle

  • public class APRectangle
extends java.lang.Object
    The rectangle has an APPoint top left corner, and width, height, and angle

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      APRectangle(APPoint topLeft, double width, double height)
      Creates a new APRectangle object.

      • APRectangle

        public APRectangle(APPoint topLeft,
                   double width,
                   double height)
        Creates a new APRectangle object.
        Parameters:
        topLeft - (APPoint) the top left corner of the Rectangle
        width - (double) the horizontal width of the Rectangle
        height - (double) the vertical height of the Rectangle

        Sets the Rectangle's angle.
        Parameters:
        a - (double) The value of the angle of the Rectangle

      • getTopRight

        public APPoint getTopRight()
        Returns the top right point of the Rectangle.

        Makes new APPoint coordinates for the new APPoint, topRight calculated by using the distance and angle the APPoint is positioned from the top left point, which has coordinates that do not change in this program

        Returns:
        (APPoint) The top right point of the Rectangle

      • getBottomLeft

        public APPoint getBottomLeft()
        Returns the bottom left point of the Rectangle.

        Makes new APPoint coordinates for the new APPoint, bottomLeft, which is calculated by using the distance and angle it is positioned from the top left point of the Rectangle, which has coordinated that do not change in this program

        Returns:
        (APPoint) The bottom left point of the Rectangle

      • getBottomRight

        public APPoint getBottomRight()
        Returns the bottom right point of the Rectangle.

        Makes new APPoint coordinates for the new APPoint, bottomRight, which is calculated by using the distance the point is away from the top right point of the Rectangle and the angle at the top left point

        Returns:
        (APPoint) The bottom right point of the Rectangle

      • shrink

        public void shrink(double d)
        Shrinks the width and height by d%.
        Parameters:
        d - (double) The percentage the width and height are shrunk by

      • draw

        public void draw(java.awt.Graphics g)
        Draws the Rectangle by drawing lines that connect the four points of the Rectangle.

        The top left point is connected to the top right point, the top left point is also connected to the bottom left point, the bottom left point is connected to the bottom right point, and the bottom right point is connected to the top right point

        Parameters:
        g - (Graphics) a Graphics object

      • printAPRectangle

        public static java.lang.String printAPRectangle(APRectangle G)
        Returns a statement of the results with only the top left point, width, and length.
        Parameters:
        G - (APRectangle) The Rectangle
        Returns:
        (String) a string that includes the left top point of the Rectangle G, the width of the Rectangle G, and the height of the Rectangle G
